cu.error_type: unreachable elements or wrong routing definitions
cu.explanation_en: Setting the IPv4 address for NG-U to an unreachable network (10.0.0.1) disrupts user plane connectivity, preventing data traffic routing through the UPF.

du.error_type: unreachable elements or wrong routing definitions
du.explanation_en: Changing the local N address to an invalid IP (10.0.0.1) causes the DU to fail binding to the correct interface for F1-Northbound communication.
